title: Drag and drop deals between pipeline stages
description: As a sales representative, I want to drag and drop deal cards between pipeline stages, so that I can quickly update deal progress without opening detail views.

acceptanceCriteria.criterion: Given I am viewing the pipeline board, when I drag a deal card from one stage to another, then the card moves smoothly with visual feedback
Given I drop a deal card in a new stage, when the drop completes, then the deal's stage is updated in the database immediately
Given a deal changes stage, when the update completes, then the deal probability is automatically updated based on the new stage
Given I am dragging a deal, when I hover over an invalid drop zone, then visual feedback indicates the drop is not allowed

definitionOfDone.item: Drag and drop functionality implemented with touch support
Optimistic UI updates with rollback on failure
Activity log entry created for stage changes
